content: Hello, i've got zulip installed and i'm able to login, however when i try to invite others, i get an email with "Client does not have permissions to send as this sender [CY4PR10MB2008.namprd10.prod.outlook.com]"
Is there a setting to force the from email ?
Figured it out.. it was the noreply email. and had to restart the server...
@Ayad AlKaabi yeah, we should probably cover the issue of multiple email senders in our documentation better, since it seems to hit a lot of folks.
Ya, the issue that made it worse for me is in previous version (i think 1.3) there were two email settings, Default_from and no_reply...
I like how in 1.8 its only one setting that makes more sense
